1538009272_1HrQ48VceWqeGu9qmC2Y8VxUsGNSJ.body: Both seem to have their uses.  If you needs viewing with just a browser and a link, IPFS is good.  Zeronet seems to do more, but the separate install is to be needed first?
Is it because the ZeroNet client also serves, while not many use the ipfs program and instead access through gateways?
